scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of women, possibly a procession or a gathering, walking amidst stylized foliage. The women are dressed in medieval attire, with elaborate headdresses and flowing robes. Their faces are rendered with simple lines, conveying a sense of solemnity or contemplation. The foliage, depicted as tall, leafy branches, suggests an outdoor setting, perhaps a garden or a natural landscape. The overall impression is one of serene movement and communal presence.
